results.description: Use news_pct_1min (high coverage 0.9717, moderate userCount). SUGGESTION1: used main field only to capture immediate momentum. SUGGESTION2: no vector field available. SUGGESTION3: no backfill needed (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4: field has reasonable user/alpha counts so likely robust. Confidence set to 0.62 because short-window momentum is common but noisy.

Use news_pct_5_min to detect sustained early momentum. SUGGESTION1: single field used to keep implementation short. SUGGESTION3: coverage 0.774 -> no backfill. SUGGESTION4: userCount low but alphaCount moderate; applied cautiously. Confidence 0.58.

Idea: mean-revert extreme one-minute moves from news. SUGGESTION1: used news_pct_1min. SUGGESTION3: no backfill. SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. Applied ts_zscore then reverse for reversion. Confidence 0.6.

Combine current volume surprise with short move: news_vol_stddev (high coverage) and news_pct_10min. SUGGESTION1: used 2 fields. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: vol field has good userCount. Confidence 0.66.

Normalize immediate return by ATR: news_pct_1min / news_atr_ratio. SUGGESTION1: two fields. SUGGESTION3: both coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION4: news_atr_ratio high alphaCount supports signal. Confidence 0.63.
Use news_indx_perf (high coverage) to capture stock vs market reaction. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION4: good alphaCount. Confidence 0.6.

Use news_open_gap to fade large opens following news. SUGGESTION1: single field; coverage 0.6247 (borderline). SUGGESTION3: apply ts_backfill(,5) if missing. SUGGESTION4: userCount moderate. Confidence 0.55.

Use news_eps_actual vs expected proxy (not available) so use news_eps_actual alone to capture momentum. SUGGESTION1: single field high coverage 0.9646. SUGGESTION4: decent user/alpha counts. Confidence 0.61.
Use news_tot_ticks (high coverage) to identify attention-driven moves combined with price change. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_tot_ticks + news_pct_30min. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.64.
Compare pre/post VWAP gap: news_pre_vwap and news_post_vwap to detect reversion after VWAP dislocation. SUGGESTION1: two fields, coverage >0.7. SUGGESTION3: not needed. Confidence 0.59.
Use news_short_interest (coverage 0.872). SUGGESTION4: low userCount but alphaCount moderate; still informative for squeezes. Confidence 0.56.
High PE names overreact to news; use news_pe_ratio with recent move. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pe_ratio + news_pct_60min. Coverage high. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Use news_max_up_ret to capture strong upward moves continuation. SUGGESTION1: single field with good coverage 0.8458. Confidence 0.57.
Use news_max_dn_ret to catch oversold after extreme drops. SUGGESTION1: single field with coverage 0.9704. Confidence 0.6.
Compare previous intraday trend news_prev_day_ret with immediate reaction news_pct_10min. SUGGESTION1: two fields; both coverage >0.6. Confidence 0.58.

Scale return signal by current vs moving volume (news_ratio_vol). SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pct_30min and news_ratio_vol (coverage 0.5122 borderline). SUGGESTION3: apply ts_backfill for ratio if missing. Confidence 0.6.
ts_delta on news_pct_1min to detect acceleration of move. SUGGESTION1: single field. No backfill needed. Confidence 0.53.
Use news_pct_120min (coverage 0.9063) for medium-term continuation. SUGGESTION4: adequate alphaCount. Confidence 0.59.
Use news_pct_30sec (coverage 0.9673) to capture microsecond reactions. SUGGESTION4: lower userCount but coverage high. Confidence 0.5 (microstructure noisy).
Divide short return by news_vol_stddev to compare significance. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pct_10min & news_vol_stddev (coverage high). Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Range breakout using session range zscore
results.description: Use news_session_range_pct (low coverage 0.268) to capture extreme session ranges. SUGGESTION3: apply ts_backfill(5). SUGGESTION4: userCount moderate. Confidence 0.48.
If price opens far then news moves opposite, fade using news_open and news_ton_last. SUGGESTION1: two fields, both coverage >0.7. Confidence 0.54.
Combine earnings field news_eps_actual with news_tot_ticks to prefer earnings with attention. SUGGESTION1: two fields; both high coverage. Confidence 0.66.
Neutralize stock return by SPY movement using news_spy_last and news_pct_30min (stock). SUGGESTION1: two fields (spy & stock). Coverage high. Confidence 0.6.
Use news_mins_1_chg (coverage 0.9175) to detect quick moves and mean-revert. SUGGESTION4: good counts. Confidence 0.57.
Use news_mov_vol (30-day) to prefer continuation in liquid names combined with news_pct_60min. SUGGESTION4: mov_vol has good counts. Confidence 0.61.
Use nws12_afterhsz_1_minute (after-hours 1-min pct) and session open reaction. SUGGESTION1: two fields, coverage ~0.707; applied cautiously. Confidence 0.52.
Compare news_pct_10min to news_atr_ratio to identify moves large relative to normal range. SUGGESTION1: two fields; both coverage >0.6. Confidence 0.64.
Use news_ton_last vs news_eod_vwap to spot momentum continuation. SUGGESTION1: two fields, high coverage. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term volatility breakout with recent range
results.description: Use news_range_stddev to scale immediate return. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pct_5_min & news_range_stddev (coverage 0.6172 borderline -> no backfill applied). Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum only in high attention providers
results.description: Filter by provider index popularity (nws12_mainz_provider coverage 0.9741) multiplied by return. SUGGESTION1: two fields. SUGGESTION4: provider userCount high. Confidence 0.6.
Scale return by market cap (news_cap) to capture institutional flows. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pct_30min & news_cap (coverage high). Confidence 0.58.
Use sign of 1-minute return to produce directional trading signal. SUGGESTION1: single field. Confidence 0.45 (very simple).
Use news_high_exc_stddev to normalize upward excursions and combine with pct_30min. SUGGESTION1: two fields, coverage high. Confidence 0.6.
Prefer continuation when stock vol is below recent average using news_atr14. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pct_120min & news_atr14 (coverage 0.8947). Confidence 0.56.
Use news_eod_vwap vs news_ton_last to capture close-run continuation next day. SUGGESTION1: two fields high coverage. Confidence 0.53.
Use news_main_vwap deviation from TONLast (news_ton_last) to detect VWAP breakouts. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.6.
Use news_mins_3_chg to identify extremes over 3 minutes and reverse. SUGGESTION1: single field with high coverage. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Spike persistence weighted by prev close
results.description: Normalize intraday move by prev close: news_prevclose (low coverage 0.1728) -> apply ts_backfill(5). SUGGESTION3: backfilled prevclose. Confidence 0.5.
Use news_pct_90min to filter initial moves for sustained direction. SUGGESTION1: single field high coverage. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Short-term volatility fade using vol ratio
results.description: If current vol spike (news_vol_stddev) is very high, fade immediate return. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pct_5_min & news_vol_stddev. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply return by inverse short interest (news_short_interest) to favor low shorted continuation. SUGGESTION1: two fields; coverage OK. Confidence 0.53.
Use news_eod_close relative to news_ton_last normalized by ts_mean. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_eod_close & news_ton_last both high coverage. Confidence 0.59.
If TONLast close to session high (news_ton_high), expect continuation. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.52.
Use news_rangestddev to detect contraction then breakout using 30min return. SUGGESTION1: two fields coverage ~0.6172 for range -> acceptable. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Fast-attack: favor names with low prevday volatility
results.description: Use news_prev_day_ret magnitude inverse combined with 1-min return. SUGGESTION1: two fields. prev_day coverage 0.7311. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings surprise scaled by market cap (small-cap alpha)
results.description: Multiply news_eps_actual by inverse market cap to capture small-cap overreaction. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_eps_actual & news_cap. Confidence 0.6.

Use days_from_last_change on news_prevday (not available as direct field) so proxy with nws12_mainz_newrecord (new record indicator) to prefer fresh news momentum. SUGGESTION1: use nws12_mainz_newrecord (coverage 0.9741). Confidence 0.55.
Use news_mins_5_pct_up (coverage 0.9214) to prefer rapid up moves. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Scale return by mov_vol to avoid illiquid noise. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pct_30min & news_mov_vol (coverage 0.8046). Confidence 0.6.
Use news_tot_ticks to identify names with high micro activity and favor continuation. SUGGESTION1: single field combined with pct_10min. Confidence 0.62.
Compute news_pct_30min - SPY close change (news_spy_close) to find idiosyncratic strength. SUGGESTION1: two fields both high coverage. Confidence 0.6.
Favor providers with many alphas (nws12_mainz_provider) to reduce noise, multiplied by return. SUGGESTION4: provider userCount high. Confidence 0.56.
Prefer continuation in large caps using news_mktcap & news_pct_10min. SUGGESTION1: two high-coverage fields. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Price move standardized by 30-day avg range
results.description: Divide news_pct_30min by news_atr14 to scale by typical range. SUGGESTION1: two fields both high coverage. Confidence 0.63.
Combine 5-min and 30-min returns for persistence: multiply ts_zscore(news_pct_5_min,5) * ts_zscore(news_pct_30min,10). SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.6.
Reverse strong 30-sec moves expecting quick micro-reverts. SUGGESTION1: news_pct_30sec has high coverage. Confidence 0.5.
Use ts_ir (ts_mean / ts_stddev) on news_pct_60min to prefer persistent signals. SUGGESTION1: single field with ts_ir operator. Confidence 0.65.
Use news_mins_10_chg to favor moves that occurred quickly. SUGGESTION1: single field coverage 0.7395. Confidence 0.54.
Combine news_high_exc_stddev with pct_60min to capture extended moves. SUGGESTION1: two fields high coverage. Confidence 0.59.
Use nws12_prez_1_minute (pre-market 1-min) and session pct to detect continuation. SUGGESTION1: two fields; coverage varies but applied. Confidence 0.51.
Require both news_open_vol and news_curr_vol to be high to trust momentum. SUGGESTION1: two fields, open_vol coverage low (0.4361) -> apply ts_backfill(5). Confidence 0.55.
Reverse cases where 10-min move is extreme but 30-min reverts using difference. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.56.
Multiply short return by inverse news_pe_ratio to favor undervalued continuation. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Immediate reversal when minute-to-minute ticks spike
results.description: Use news_tot_ticks to identify noisy spikes and reverse. SUGGESTION1: two fields; both high coverage. Confidence 0.54.
Multiply return by ATR ratio (news_atr_ratio) to prefer moves that are large relative to range. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.62.
Apply winsorize to news_pct_30min to reduce outliers before ranking. SUGGESTION1: single field. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Composite attention score: ticks * vol ratio
results.description: Multiply news_tot_ticks and news_vol_stddev to get attention, then combine with return. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.63.
If current volume is low relative to mov_vol, reverse small moves. Use news_ratio_vol (coverage 0.5122 -> may backfill). SUGGESTION3: apply ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.5.
Use news_max_upamt to detect large absolute moves and continue if accompanied by volume. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.58.
Reverse 30s extremes when tot_ticks not elevated (avoid running into genuine liquidity-driven moves). SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.49.
Trade continuation only if 120-min and 60-min returns agree. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.6.
Downweight returns in high ATR names using news_atr14 inverse. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.56.
Aggregate provider-level result nws12_mainz_result1 and rank cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION2: this field is not vector; used as scalar. SUGGESTION4: provider dataset has good counts. Confidence 0.57.
Divide minutes-to-move metric by tot_ticks to find true-speed moves. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_mins_3_chg & news_tot_ticks. Confidence 0.55.
Use news_prev_day_ret low magnitude combined with current session range to favor breakouts. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.52.
Combine rising returns with high short_interest to identify squeezes: news_pct_30min * news_short_interest. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.6.
Combine news_eps_actual with news_indx_perf to capture earnings idiosyncratic strength. SUGGESTION1: two fields high coverage. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Fast micro momentum filtered by provider
results.description: Use news_pct_1min multiplied by nws12_mainz_provider popularity. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: VWAP fade for large VWAP jumps
results.description: If TONLast far above main_vwap, fade using reverse of the difference. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by liquidity in last 30 days
results.description: Scale return by news_mov_vol to prefer liquid continuation. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply short return by volstddev to capture significant moves. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Cross-session momentum: TONLast -> next session open
results.description: Use news_ton_last persistence into next open (news_open). SUGGESTION3: coverage for news_open 0.7145; no backfill. Confidence 0.52.
Winsorize news_pct_120min then rank for robust continuation signal. SUGGESTION1: single field. Confidence 0.6.
Require both 30sec move and high tot_ticks to take momentum. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Post-news micro-mean reversion when provider novelty low
results.description: Reverse 1-min extremes when nws12_mainz_newrecord indicates duplicate news (less impact). SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.53.
Use news_session_range (coverage 0.4236 -> ts_backfill) * short return to find real breakouts. SUGGESTION3: apply backfill. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings surprise scaled by provider weight
results.description: Multiply news_eps_actual by nws12_mainz_provider popularity to prefer reputable sources. SUGGESTION4: provider has high counts. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum only in names with rising tick counts
results.description: Require positive ts_delta of news_tot_ticks to confirm momentum. SUGGESTION1: two fields (same field used with ts_delta). Confidence 0.58.
Simple cross-sectional zscore of news_pct_5_min to pick relative winners. SUGGESTION1: single field; high coverage. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by after-news minutes to 1% move
results.description: Use news_mins_1_pct_up (coverage 0.8309) to prefer rapid up moves. SUGGESTION4: reasonable counts. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: 30-min mean reversion when vol jump large
results.description: If volstddev large, reverse 30-min move: reverse(news_pct_30min / volstddev). SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.6.
Scale news_pct_10min by session range (news_session_range_pct, low coverage -> ts_backfill). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.51.
Use news_open_gap * mov_vol to prefer gaps in liquid names. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.54.
Use ts_ir on news_pct_120min to emphasize persistent returns. SUGGESTION1: single field. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Minute-based breakout if previous minute unchanged long
results.description: Use days_from_last_change on news_ton_last not available; proxy with nws12_mainz_newrecord to ensure novelty before taking momentum. SUGGESTION1: single field proxy. Confidence 0.5.
Multiply news_pct_1min and news_pct_5_min for persistence. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Earnings gap capture: open_gap vs eps
results.description: Use news_open_gap & news_eps_actual to capture earnings-induced gaps and trade direction. SUGGESTION1: two fields; coverage OK. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Session momentum normalized by 30-day avg vol
results.description: Divide news_pct_60min by mov_vol to get liquidity-adjusted signal. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.6.
Reverse extreme 30-min moves in very large caps using news_mktcap inverse. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.53.
Use ts_arg_max on 3-min series of news_pct_3 (news_mins_3_chg proxy) to pick instruments currently at local maxima. SUGGESTION2: no vector. Confidence 0.54.
Rank subtract(news_pct_10min - news_pct_20min) to find accelerating moves. SUGGESTION1: two fields (use news_pct_10min and news_mins_20_chg as proxy). Confidence 0.55.
Multiply news_eps_actual by provider indicator and tot_ticks to favor well-attended earnings. SUGGESTION1: used two fields to keep limits. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: 30-min momentum limited to top quantile of mov_vol
results.description: Normalize then bucket by mov_vol; here simplifed to multiply to favor high mov_vol. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after large up excursion vs stddev
results.description: Reverse when news_high_exc_stddev large relative to move. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by previous close proximity
results.description: If TONLast close to prev close (news_prevclose backfilled), reduce signal; use division. SUGGESTION3: news_prevclose backfilled (coverage low). Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Rapid up-count momentum using mins_to_1% metric
results.description: Inverse of news_mins_1_pct_up to favor fast 1% rises. SUGGESTION1: single field. Confidence 0.54.
Divide short return by news_tot_ticks to de-emphasize noisy tick-heavy moves. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.55.
Multiply earnings surprise by volstddev to capture moves with liquidity. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.6.
Require signs of 1-min and 5-min returns to match for signal: multiply signs via zscores. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Microstructure safe momentum: require high tot_ticks and volstddev
results.description: Multiply 1-min return by tot_ticks and vol_stddev to confirm genuine moves. SUGGESTION4: tot_ticks high alphaCount. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum only in names with positive index-relative perf
results.description: Use news_indx_perf to require idiosyncratic outperformance before trading momentum. SUGGESTION1: two fields news_pct_30min & news_indx_perf. Confidence 0.6.
Use nws12_afterhsz_10_min (after-hours 10-min pct) combined with curr_vol to predict daytime continuation. SUGGESTION1: two fields; coverage ~0.707. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Scaled reversion by PE: high PE overreverts
results.description: Reverse strong moves in high PE names by multiplying reverse signal with pe_ratio. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Large move sustain when prevday volatile
results.description: If prevday had large move (news_prev_day_ret), continuation more likely; multiply. SUGGESTION1: two fields. Confidence 0.52.
